mapper.sql: Id, UserName, `Name`, Email, Telemoble, UserType, `Password`, RegTime, LastLoginTime, Score, CreatTime, Flag
mapper.insert: insert into users (UserName, `Name`, Email, Telemoble, UserType, `Password`, RegTime, LastLoginTime, Score, CreatTime, Flag) values (#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telemoble,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into users
UserName, `Name`, Email, Telemoble, UserType, `Password`, RegTime, LastLoginTime, Score, CreatTime, Flag,
#{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telemoble,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update users
UserName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`Name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
Telemoble = #{telemoble,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UserType = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`Password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RegTime = #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
LastLoginTime = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER},
CreatTime = #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
Flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update users set UserName = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `Name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, Telemoble = #{telemoble,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UserType = #{usertype,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `Password` = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RegTime = #{regtime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, LastLoginTime = #{lastlogintime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Score = #{score,jdbcType=INTEGER}, CreatTime = #{creattime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, Flag = #{flag,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where Id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT id FROM users WHERE Telemoble = #{key}
SELECT id FROM users WHERE OR UserName = #{key}
SELECT ID FROM users WHERE (Telemoble = #{key} OR UserName = #{key} OR Email = #{key})
SELECT * FROM users WHERE (Telemoble = #{key} OR UserName = #{key} OR Email = #{key})
